00110             function                add_to_history( $id , $ObjectType , $Record )
00111             {
00112                   try
00113                   {
00114                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00115                         
00116                         $Record = $this->Security->get( $Record , 'string' );
00117                         
00118                         $ObjectType = $this->Link->get_link_type( 'history' , $ObjectType );
00119                         $User = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_user();
00120                         $Author = get_field( $User , 'id' );
00121                         
00122                         foreach( $Record as $FieldName => $FieldValue )
00123                         {
00124                               $this->Database->insert( $this->NativeTable , 
00125                                     'object_id , object_type , field_name , field_value , creation_date , author' , 
00126                                     "$id , $ObjectType , '$FieldName' , '$FieldValue' , NOW() , $Author"
00127                               );
00128                               
00129                               $this->Database->commit();
00130                         }
00131                   }
00132                   catch( Exception $e )
00133                   {
00134                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00135                   }
00136             }

00164             function                get_history( $id , $ObjectType )
00165             {
00166                   try
00167                   {
00168                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00169                         $ObjectType = $this->Link->get_link_type( 'history' , $ObjectType );
00170                         
00171                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00172                         
00173                         return( 
00174                               $this->Database->select( 
00175                                     $this->NativeTable.'.* , umx_user.login AS author_name' , 
00176                                     $this->NativeTable.' , umx_user' , 
00177                                     $this->NativeTable.".author = umx_user.id AND ".
00178                                     $this->NativeTable.".object_id = $id AND ".
00179                                     $this->NativeTable.".object_type = $ObjectType
00180                                     ORDER BY id ASC"
00181                               )
00182                         );
00183                   }
00184                   catch( Exception $e )
00185                   {
00186                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00187                   }
00188             }

00210                   try
00211                   {
00212                         $Code = '<table><tr><td class="table_header">{lang:history_date}</td>'.
00213                               '<td class="table_header">{lang:history_time}</td>'.

00249             function                get_grid_lines( &$Changes )
00250             {
00251                   try
00252                   {
00253                         $Lines = array();
00254                         
00255                         $Previous = array();
00256                         
00257                         foreach( $Changes as $i => $Change )
00258                         {
00259                               $Time = strtotime( get_field( $Change , 'creation_date' ) );
00260                               $Class = 'table_row_'.( $i % 2 ? 'even' : 'odd' );
00261 
00262                               $Code  = '<tr class="grid_row"><td class="'.$Class.'">'.date( 'd.m.y' , $Time ).'</td>';
00263                               $Code .= '<td class="'.$Class.'">'.date( 'H:i:s' , $Time ).'</td>';
00264                               $Code .= '<td class="'.$Class.'">'.get_field( $Change , 'author_name' ).'</td>';
00265                               
00266                               $FieldName = get_field( $Change , 'field_name' );
00267                               $Code .= "<td class=\"$Class\">$FieldName</td>";
00268                               $Code .= '<td class="'.$Class.'">'.get_field( $Previous , $FieldName , '-' ).'</td>';
00269                               
00270                               $FieldValue = get_field( $Change , 'field_value' );
00271                               $Code .= "<td class=\"$Class\">$FieldValue</td>";
00272                               $Previous[ $FieldName ] = $FieldValue;
00273                               
00274                               $Lines [] = $Code;
00275                         }
00276                         
00277                         return( implode( '' , array_reverse( $Lines ) ) );
00278                   }
00279                   catch( Exception $e )
00280                   {
00281                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00282                   }
00283             }
00284             
00311             function                get_changes_grid( $id , $ObjectType )
00312             {
00313                   try
00314                   {
00315                         $Code = $this->get_grid_header();
00316                               
00317                         $Changes = $this->get_history( $id , $ObjectType );
00318                         
00319                         if( isset( $Changes[ 0 ] ) )
00320                         {
00321                               $Code .= $this->get_grid_lines( $Changes );
00322                         }
00323                         else
00324                         {
00325                               $Code .= '<tr><td colspan="6" align="center">{lang:data_for_grid_was_not_found}</td><tr>';
00326                         }
00327                         
00328                         return( "$Code</table>" );
00329                   }
00330                   catch( Exception $e )
00331                   {
00332                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00333                   }
00334             }
